components.description:
A short, flat glass, as used for brown liquors like whiskey or Scotch whisky.

Apple, Google, Facebook, and WhatsApp serve theirs neat, while other platforms include ice ("on the rocks").

Samsung's glass previously featured the faint initials ONI, an apparent in-company easter egg.
components.title: Tumbler Glass

description:
A short, flat glass, as used for brown liquors like whiskey or Scotch whisky.

Apple, Google, Facebook, and WhatsApp serve theirs neat, while other platforms include ice ("on the rocks").

Samsung's glass previously featured the faint initials ONI, an apparent in-company easter egg.
title: Tumbler Glass

version.description:
The Unicode Consortium accepted the following emoji 72 emojis for Unicode 9.0. This update was released on June 21, 2016. Most vendors added support for this update within the 2016 calendar year. Sample images and more about Unicode 9.0.

Emoji 4.0 was published in late 2016, which added additional emoji professions.

New in Unicode 9

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Miscellaneous mark
emoji_net_data.definition: A flat-bottomed glass, often associated with drinks such as whisky or rum. Shown with ice cubes and liquid inside the glass. Tumbler Glass w http://emojipedia.org/tumbler-glass/
emoji_net_data.name: tumbler glass

bn:13771062v: To drink liquor, usually to excess.

bn:13771063v: To cause someone to drink liquor, usually to excess.

bn:00012195n: An alcoholic beverage that is distilled rather than fermented
A distilled beverage with a high alcohol content, such as brandy, whiskey, or vodka.
A distilled beverage, spirit, liquor, or hard liquor is an alcoholic beverage produced by distillation of a mixture produced from alcoholic fermentation, such as wine.
Alcoholic beverage containing more than 20 percent alcohol.
John Barleycorn is a British folksong.
Alcoholic beverage produced through destillation, regardless of alcohol content.
Alcoholic beverage that is produced by distilling
Strong alcoholic drink derived from fermentation and distillation.

bn:00081031n: An alcoholic liquor distilled from fermented grain and usually aged in in oak barrels.
Alcoholic beverage that is distilled from fermented grain mash and aged in wooden casks (generally oak).
Type of distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash
A liquor made from fermented mash of grain
Whisky or whiskey is a type of distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash.
A liquor distilled from the fermented mash of grain (as rye, corn, or barley).

apple_vendor_description: The tumbler glass emoji on Apple devices is a clear, shapely vessel with a substantial base, appearing almost crystalline under Apple's characteristic realistic lighting. Its soft, rounded edges and the subtle reflections on its surface give it a premium, tactile quality, suggesting a refreshing beverage within. This inviting depiction is often used to signify relaxation, enjoyment, or a toast to good times.
